item.title: mFLoor Recommendations
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information This document outlines recommendations LOC Software is giving in order to help the reseller to better develop and maintain mFloor. New installation When installing mFloor at a new location, it is always preferable to follow these steps in order to not cause any issues when installing on their production server. item.title: mFloor Overview
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information Overview of the LOC SMS mFloor application and how it integrates into the LOC SMS environment. It provides a brief explanation on the technical aspects of hardware, network and security, and provides details on the system architecture, its installation and how to update it.
